content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
• No new structures have been successfully placed on the map. Multiple steps attempted to supply or craft a Lab at (0.5, 2.5), but all attempts failed due to inventory shortages, resource dependencies, and placement errors.
• Although the agent referenced pre‐existing smelting facilities – an alternative furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) used for iron plate production and a copper furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0) used for copper plate production – no structure was created by the agent during these steps.

ERROR TIPS
• Incorrect API usage with get_entities():
 – Avoid using unsupported keyword arguments (e.g. “radius”) or supplying positional arguments if none are expected. Verify the function’s defined signature before calling.
• Lab placement failures:
 – Ensure the Lab is available in inventory before attempting placement and check that the target tile is unoccupied.
• Iteration over null results:
 – Validate that functions returning entity lists do not yield None before iterating over them.
• Lab crafting errors due to missing ingredients:
 – Confirm that all prerequisite sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic circuits, and copper cables) are available in sufficient quantities.
 – Verify that previous resource production steps (smelting and intermediary crafting) have successfully yielded the required components before reattempting Lab production.
